p: P. alliacea is a herbaceous shrub belonging to Petiveriaceae, the pigeonberry family. It is native to tropical regions like Africa, India, the Caribbean, tropical areas of North and Central America. P. alliacea produces a number of bioactive compounds including polyphenols, alkaloids, tannins, coumarins, steroids, essential oils, dibenzyl trisulfide, and flavonoids [ 39].
